Class Messaging.BeingSubstitution

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
regexodus.Substitution
Enclosing class:
Messaging
protected static class Messaging.BeingSubstitution extends Object implements regexodus.Substitution
Undocumented; use at your own peril. (It's a RegExodus Substitution that handles a really complicated regex and its replacements.)
